messages.content: That's perfect. I knew your mom would know! Thanks, Bryn... it helps me with my studies.
How accurate? I think I was born at 3:20am, in Ottawa. Going to see Attack the Block tonight.

Cool. I just looked at the trailer. Asked John about it, but it's not on his radar yet. Thanks for the heads up, Bryn. I hope you're well.
I asked your mom for your birthtime a while back because I'm studying astrology (and I figured she would know these things) but she didn't get back to me. Not a lot of people know their birthtimes, unfortunately.
Just saw "Bellflower" ... most exciting film I've seen in years. Brought back memories of when films really meant something to me ...
